dict.string: MathScan AI uses your camera to capture photos of handwritten or printed math problems, equations, and worksheets. For example, you can photograph a math equation from your homework and the app will analyze it, solve it, and provide step-by-step explanations.

MathScan AI accesses your photo library to let you select existing photos of math problems, equations, worksheets, or textbook pages for analysis. For example, you can choose a saved screenshot of a math question to have it solved step-by-step.
MathScan AI saves solved math problems and step-by-step solutions to your photo library. For example, you can save a solution image to review later or share with classmates.
MathScan AI uses your microphone to enable voice input when describing math problems. For example, you can speak a math question aloud instead of typing it.
MathScan AI uses Face ID to securely authenticate and protect your saved math solutions and study history.
